attributes.action: Let muslim secondary students have the right to pray in school
attributes.background: Currently, many secondary schools do not allow students time and space to pray. Every secondary school pupils should have the right to request this and schools should be legally obliged to provide it. Prayer is part of Islam and it is essential for Muslims to pray at the right time.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646079
